data.actual_result: It is not capped and it goes out of the window.
data.expected_result: Just before it goes out of the window it ends with "...".
data.short_description: Pressing the '+' sign on a category with a long name will cause in the name going out of the window. (same goes for clone channel)
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a category with a long name - Press '+' and see how it goes out of the window.
